scripts.local-db-init: NODE_ENV=local npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=local npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.local-db-reset: NODE_ENV=local npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=local npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=local npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.dev-db-init: NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.dev-db-reset: NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.stg-db-init: NODE_ENV=staging npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=staging npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.stg-db-reset: NODE_ENV=staging npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=staging npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=staging npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
